attributes.action: david cameron to explain himself about gays
attributes.additional_details: after the comment mr cameron had made on the this morning program relating gays and lesibans to peadophiles he should be made to explain himself this is the quote from the prime minster ""There is a danger if we are not careful that this can turn into a sort of witch hunt, particularly about people who are gay, and I'm worried about the sort of thing you are doing right now, taking a list of names off the internet."

rejection.details: This is a matter for the Prime Minister personally and not the Government.
